participant_1.background:
I love working with flowers and making people happy with them.
i work in commercials.
I'm a lifelong learner who loves to devour books and explore new things.
I like to cook with my mom and we try new recipes every week.
I want to find a place to live that is perfect for my hobbies and interests.

participant_2.background:
I'm trying to figure out how to cope with my breakup.
it is my universe , and everyone else is just a character in it.
I keep the memory of my grandparents alive by telling stories about them to my children.
i see a therapist that does not really understand me.
i am a father.

content.text: Hey! I just got off the phone with my therapist and I'm feeling a bit better.
That's great to hear! What did you guys talk about?
We talked about my breakup and how I'm coping with it.
I'm sorry to hear that. How are you feeling about it?
It's been tough, but I'm trying to stay positive.
That's good. It sounds like you're on the right track.
Do you have any hobbies that you enjoy?
I love to cook with my mom and we try new recipes every week.
That sounds like fun! I love to cook too.
Do you have any favorite recipes?
I love making lasagna. It's my favorite dish to cook.
Lasagna is delicious! I love it too.
It's so easy to make and it always turns out great.
It is. I always make it for my family when we have get-togethers.
That's a great idea. I'm going to have to make it soon.
You should! It's a great dish to share with friends and family.
